channel.title: Authors on Srikanth Avasarala
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Srikanth Avasarala

item.description: Hello! I am currently pursuing Masters (Research) in Computational Science from the Department of Computational and Data Science, IISc Bangalore. I am currently affiliated with the QUEST lab (Quantification of Uncertainity in Engineering, Science and Technology) working under Dr. Deepak Subramani with research focus mainly on Data assimilation in dynamical systems.
